name: Galactic dating: Harem in space station
name_original: Galactic dating: Harem in space station
description:
Welcome aboard the Space Station!

You've just landed in this incredible space center, and all the possibilities for exploration are open to you. As your ship prepares for the next leg of its journey, immerse yourself in a space dating simulator and meet creatures from all corners of the galaxy.

You have to choose which of the beautiful inhabitants of the station you want to chat with, and if they reciprocate, you can invite them on a date. Each character, whether human or otherwise, brings their own unique traits and desires, creating a variety of options for encounters.

There are no secrets of unexplored galaxies here; instead there is only one station, populated by characters as unique as the stars themselves. Your interests and desires can become a firefly for those who are looking for something special in this endless universe, and that special thing can be you.

Embark on this cosmic journey, meeting a variety of your companions and making connections that appeal to you. Open up new horizons of communication and create stories that will be remembered by us and our new friends forever.
